A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The more I watch this film\, the more I appreciate it. Living in a post-Rise of Skywalker world makes it seem even better. While it does take several missteps with Finn and Rose\, the scenes with Rey\, Kylo\, Snoke\, and Luke are some of the best Star Wars I have ever seen. This was a film I didn’t know I needed.
